text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide hl7.fhir.pt.core

hl7fhirptcore

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.pt/fhir/core/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.pt.core

Example IG exercises many of the fields in a SUSHI configuration.

name: hl7fhirptcore
title: HL7 PT FHIR Implementation Guide: Example IG Release 1 | STU1
description: Example IG exercises many of the fields in a SUSHI configuration.

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: Association
resource.description: The details about the device when it is affixed or inside of a patient. - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: AvailabilityStatus
resource.description: The availability of the device - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: BirthPlace
resource.description: Extension for birth place in Portugal

resource.name: Category
resource.description: Devices may be associated with one or more categories. - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: ChargeItem
resource.description: Billing code or reference associated with the device - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: ConditionPersistence
resource.description: Extension to Condition Persistence in Portugal. This extension contains the perseverance of a problem (e.g., acute, chronic, etc.). It is necessary to create a table with codes for the correct mapping of this field, associating a system to it

resource.name: CountType
resource.description: Whether the report is about the current inventory count (snapshot) or a differential change in inventory (change).

resource.name: Death
resource.description: [PT] Extension to give information about death

resource.name: DiagnosisPriority
resource.description: Extension to Diagnosis Priority in Portugal

resource.name: Diet
resource.description: Extension to indicate the type of diet of the patient

resource.name: DispenserInstruction
resource.description: Extension indicating whether medication is provided or not

resource.name: DisplayName_Device
resource.description: The name used to display by default when the device is referenced. - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: EconomicInsufficiency
resource.description: Extension for Economic Insufficiency in Portugal

resource.name: ExtraAppointment
resource.description: Extension to identify if the appointment will occur in extra scheduling

resource.name: Guideline
resource.description: Information aimed at providing directions for the usage of this model of device - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: InventoryListing
resource.description: An inventory listing section (grouped by any of the attributes).

resource.name: IsBackup
resource.description: Extension to indicate if the device is a backup for use, if there is no free device.

resource.name: IsSubPotent
resource.description: Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: MarketDistribution
resource.description: Indicates where and when the device is available on the market - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: MedicationParticipant
resource.description: Extension that indicates which participants may be part of the drug flow described in the form

resource.name: Nationality
resource.description: Extension for nationality in Portugal

resource.name: NativeLanguage
resource.description: Extension in Portugal to indicate if the indicated language is the native language

resource.name: Note
resource.description: A note associated with the InventoryReport.

resource.name: NotPerformReason
resource.description: Reason to not perform the plan, request, order, task or other action

resource.name: Operation
resource.description: The status of the device itself - whether it is switched on, or activated, etc. - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: OperationType
resource.description: What type of operation is being performed - addition or subtraction.

resource.name: OperationTypeReason
resource.description: The reason for this count - regular count, ad-hoc count, new arrivals, etc.

resource.name: Packaging
resource.description: Information about the packaging of the device, i.e. how the device is packaged - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: ProcedurePriority
resource.description: Extension to Procedure Priority in Portugal

resource.name: Proficiency
resource.description: Extension to indicate qualification proficiency in Portugal

resource.name: PTAddress
resource.description: Extension to parish in Portugal

resource.name: PT_ActivityDefinition
resource.description: A generic ActivityDefinition resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_AllergyIntolerance
resource.description: A generic AllergiesIntolerance resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_Appointment
resource.description: A generic Appointment resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_Bundle
resource.description: A generic Bundle resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_CarePlan
resource.description: A generic CarePlan resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_CodeSystem
resource.description: A generic CodeSystem resource for Portugal. It can be used for masterfile situations of specialties.

resource.name: PT_Condition
resource.description: A generic Condition resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_Coverage
resource.description: A generic Coverage resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_Device
resource.description: A generic Device resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_DeviceDefinition
resource.description: A generic DeviceDefinition resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_DiagnosticReportLaboratory
resource.description: A generic DiagnosticReport Laboratory resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_DiagnosticReportRadiology
resource.description: A generic DiagnosticReport resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_DocumentReference
resource.description: A generic DocumentReference resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_Encounter
resource.description: A generic Encounter resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_InventoryReport_Basic
resource.description: Creation of the InventoryReport resource present in the R5 version of FHIR through the Basic resource

resource.name: PT_Location
resource.description: A generic Location resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_LocationMF
resource.description: A resource for MasterFile about Locations

resource.name: PT_LocationWarehouse
resource.description: This profile is still under analysis, so it should be used with caution.

resource.name: PT_Medication
resource.description: A generic Medication resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_MedicationAdministration
resource.description: A generic MedicationAdministration resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_MedicationDispense
resource.description: A generic MedicationDispense resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_MedicationKnowledge
resource.description: A generic MedicationKnowledge resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_MedicationRequest
resource.description: A generic MedicationRequest resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_MessageHeader
resource.description: A generic Message Header resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_NutritionOrder
resource.description: A generic NutritionOrder resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_ObservationLaboratory
resource.description: Resource to represent observation results produced by laboratory tests

resource.name: PT_ObservationRadiology
resource.description: Resource for representing observation results produced by diagnostic procedures

resource.name: PT_ObservationVitalSigns
resource.description: Resource for observation results related to vital signs

resource.name: PT_OperationOutcome
resource.description: A generic OperationOutcome resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_Organization
resource.description: A generic Organization resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_Patient
resource.description: A generic Patient resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_PlanDefinition
resource.description: A generic PlanDefiniton resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_Practitioner
resource.description: A generic Practitioner resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_PractitionerRole
resource.description: A generic PractitionerRole resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_Procedure
resource.description: A generic Procedure resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_RelatedPerson
resource.description: A generic RelatedPerson resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_RequestGroup
resource.description: A generic RequestGroup resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_ServiceRequest
resource.description: A generic ServiceRequest resource for Portugal

resource.name: PT_Specimen
resource.description: A generic Specimen resource for Portugal

resource.name: Recorded
resource.description: Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: RegulatoryIdentifier
resource.description: Identifier associated with the regulatory documentation of a set of device models - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: ReportedDateTime
resource.description: When the report has been submitted.

resource.name: Reporter
resource.description: Who submits the report.

resource.name: ReportingPeriod
resource.description: The period the report refers to.

resource.name: RequestedPeriod
resource.description: Extension to indicate when the task should be performed - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: SendLabel
resource.description: Extension to inform whether it is necessary to send a label or not

resource.name: Snomed Value Set
resource.description: Includes all codes from SNOMED CT

resource.name: Status
resource.description: The status of the inventory check or notification - whether this is draft (e.g. the report is still pending some updates) or active.

resource.name: StatusChanged
resource.description: Extension indicating when the state changed

resource.name: StatusReason
resource.description: Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: SubPotentReason
resource.description: Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

resource.name: V2 0136 Value Set
resource.description: Includes all codes from V2 0136

resource.name: Value
resource.description: Possible values to be considered in the characteristics of patients in MedicationKnowledge

resource.name: ValueBoolean
resource.description: True or false indication

resource.name: ValueRange
resource.description: A set of ordered Quantity values defined by a low and high limit.
